document_data.name: Vauv
document_data.creator: [[Bedine]]
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20210730214335/https://twitter.com/TheEdVerse/status/1421224959465119745| title = TheEdVerse on Twitter| accessdate = 30-6-2022| date = 30-7-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Vauv''' was a type of a [[nut]]-based dessert made by the [[Bedine]] folk of the [[Anauroch]] desert in [[north Faerûn]].
document_data.Description: Vauv was one of many types of desserts found throughout the [[Realms]], similar to the [[Earth]]'s [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halva halva]. Vauv was a very sweet treat made out of crushed [[dates]], roasted and ground [[tharra]], [[honey]] syrup, and [[wild rice]] [[flour]]. The mix was pressed into small handfood cakes and could keep through most months of the year apart from the hottest periods of time.
